long_description: This best-selling nutritional energy bar provides the fuel active people need for top performance. New C2 Max carbohydrate blend uses a mix of glucose and fructose that results in greater absorption, producing more energy than glucose alone. Complex carbohydrates derived from maltodextrin, brown rice and oat bran provide prolonged energy. Simple carbohydrates (glucose and fructose) are derived from pears, grapes and corn for quick energy. Protein and amino acids ward off muscle breakdown and aid in muscle recovery. B-complex vitamins contribute to energy metabolism. Contains no oil or added fat, whey, soy, lactose, artificial colors, flavors or preservatives. Chewy texture--will not melt, break or crumble under adverse conditions. Digests easily. Sealed in mylar--needs no refrigeration; store away from direct heat; six month shelf life. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: This best-selling nutritional energy bar provides the fuel active people need for top performance.
